bibl.title: Families in Ptolemaic Egypt: Continuity, Change, and Coercion.

bibl.author: POMEROY, Sarah B.

bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 69 (1997), Bibl. Beilage 2, pp. 60-61.
